com.esri.mo2.map.core
Interface BorderLayer

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseBorderLayer
public interface BorderLayer
extends Cloneable

This interface defines the APIs for an element's border layer. One important note is that the envelope defined here is relative to the element it associated with, not the coordinate system the element uses.

Method Summary
 Object clone()
          Clones the current element background
 void draw(Graphics2D g)
          Draw element's BorderLayer on the given graphic context

 Dimension2D getLayerSize()
          Gets border's size that equals the element's size minus/plus the border's gaps

          Gets Element's border paint
